```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# Loading the Yelp data
Yelp <- read_csv(here("gen", "temp", "Yelp.csv"))
                 
#1. Data Inspection 
View(Yelp)
summary(Yelp)

#Inspection of NA's
colSums(is.na(Yelp))

# Plotting 
library(ggplot2)
Yelp_Plotting <- Yelp %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Stars_Category)) +
  geom_bar(fill = "blue") +
  labs(title = "Count of Star Categories",
       x = "Stars Category",
       y = "Count") 

Yelp_Plotting

```
